title.rendered: Thank you SSCSD School Board Members

content.rendered:
The New York State School Boards Association celebrates October 16-20 as School Board Recognition Week. Thank you to the Saratoga Springs Board of Education members for their ongoing commitment to the students, staff, and families of our district.

Saratoga Springs Board of Education members will be recognized during the October 24 Board of Education meeting. As school board members, they volunteer countless hours of their time to support public education in our school community. Learn more about the role of a school board member from the New York State School Boards Association.
